caption.p: Bootstrapped mean maximum faecal egg counts and mean faecal egg counts over the peri-parturient rise in faecal egg counts) for Farm 1 and Farm 2 (both in southwestern England). Counts for low estimated breeding value ewes are shown in light grey, and high estimated breeding value ewes are shown in dark grey. Vertical ablines indicate the mean values for the 10,000 bootstrapped samples in each dataset.
